➤ May 2020 - Jan 2021

CMS Phunu8

5

This web is a new CMS replacement for old Phunu8’CMS. We build a new web with better performance and mindset based on headless CMS, design a new layout that attracts more users.

Responsibilities:

● Develop UI of web applications.

● Improve UI/UX.

● Improve performance.

● Estimate time for task.

Technologies used in project:

● HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

● Antdesign.

● Wagtail.

● Git.

● Nextjs.

Achievements:

● Experience in process to build a project.

● Learn new technical skills such as Gatsby, Nextjs or Wagtail to build CMS. ● Experience in estimate tasks.

● Ability in teamwork.
